title: A ral mek lei ninawm hi
lyrics:
A ral mek lei ninawm hi,
Van nuam a lang dawn ta;
Ka rum thin chu ram thlirin,
Lo lang tur ram mawi chu.
Lei, zan angin thim mah se,
Ropuina en vel ram;
A hnai mek rangka tual,
Imanuel ram khi.

Aw, Isu, tuikhur i ni,
Hmangaihna tuipui zau;
Ka tem thin he leiah hian,
Vanah a zual zawk chu.
Hmangaihna tuifinriatah,
Ka cheng ang i zarah;
Van ropuina kima khat,
Imanuel ramah.

Ka hmangaih van roreltu'n,
'Ka ta i ni' min ti;
Sual rethei hmun nei lo tan,
A phal van Lal in khi.
Zo ka tum ve i zar chu,
Chatuan hmun dang a vang;
Ram ni tla lo, Beramno
En vel ram lo chu.

Movin moneitu hmel chauh,
A thlir angin kei pawh;
Hmuh ka chak khawpui aiin,
Hmangaihna Lal hmel chu,
Chan tur lallukhum aiin,
Ka ngaihlu Petu chu;
Khaw ropuina chhan ber chu,
Beramno a ni.

Van Lal Fa zahngaihna chuan,
Lei hmun pawh a tilawm;
Lungngaihhna thleng fo thin hi,
Hmangaihnain a hnem.
Fak zual rawh u, Lalpa chu,
Kan phu loh lalthuthleng,
Min chantir, chhimbal zam vel,
Salem kulh chhung khi.
